Click Hotel has provided an exceptional experience during my stay. The rooms were comfortable, and the overall ambiance was inviting and well-maintained. The food was delicious, offering a variety of options to suit different tastes. What truly stood out was the staff—they were extremely supportive, courteous, and always ready to assist with a smile.

Cab services like Ola and Uber are easily accessible, ensuring hassle-free transportation. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

editorialSummary.text: Polished hotel featuring laid-back rooms & a restaurant, plus an outdoor pool & a gym.

text.text:
Exceptional Experience at Ramada Lucknow!

I recently stayed at Ramada by Wyndham Lucknow, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience from start to finish.

The hospitality here is truly top-notch — every staff member we interacted with went out of their way to ensure we felt welcome and well cared for. Whether it was the front desk, housekeeping, or restaurant staff, everyone maintained a perfect balance of professionalism and warmth. Their attentiveness and polite behaviour really stood out.

The folding and room arrangements were impeccable. The bed was perfectly made, towels and linens fresh and crisp, and the overall room setup reflected genuine attention to detail. It’s clear that the housekeeping team takes pride in their work.

The ambience of the hotel is just as impressive — elegant, peaceful, and thoughtfully designed, right from the grand lobby to the relaxing poolside and beautifully maintained lawns. It truly gives a resort-like vibe while still catering to business travelers.

Highly recommend this property to anyone visiting Lucknow — whether for business, events, or a leisure stay. Ramada has certainly set a high bar for hospitality in the city!
😍

text.text:
I recently stayed at Ramada Hotel in Lucknow and had a wonderful experience. Located about 30 km from the city towards Kanpur, the hotel offers a peaceful and spacious retreat away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

The property is vast and beautifully maintained, making it perfect for a relaxing family stay or hosting events and parties. The rooms are large, well-appointed, and very comfortable. What truly stands out is the high quality of service – the staff is courteous, attentive, and always ready to help.

Whether you’re planning a family getaway or looking for a venue for a celebration, Ramada Lucknow is an excellent choice. Highly recommended!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at *Hotel Ramada, Lucknow*, and my experience was nothing short of fantastic. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a seamless check-in process.

One of the highlights of my stay was the **breakfast experience**—an absolute treat for anyone who appreciates a good start to the day. The variety of dishes was impressive, catering to different tastes with both local and international options. The freshness and quality of the food made every morning delightful.

A special mention goes to *Brijesh*, a dedicated and courteous member of the dining hall team. His attentiveness and professionalism truly elevated the experience. Whether it was ensuring guests had everything they needed or offering recommendations with a warm smile, his service stood out. His friendly demeanor and efficiency made breakfast time even more enjoyable.

Hotel Ramada, Lucknow, not only provides comfortable accommodations but also goes the extra mile to make guests feel valued. I highly recommend this place for anyone visiting the city. Looking forward to my next stay here!

All the rooms are without window.

Walkable distance from transport Nagar metro station.

When told him that I am booking another hotel online, he gave room in next 10 minutes.
Booking was for 2 days yet charged for breakfast as I checked in early on day 1.
Rooms are having decent size. Geyser or some other thing was making huge noise, complaint to reception was acknowledged but no one came till check out. No regards for such complaint.
Breakfast is just okay. Limited options. Food quality is average. Didn't dare to check lunch and dinner.

editorialSummary.text: Unassuming rooms in a down-to-earth hotel featuring a restaurant & free breakfast.

text.text: Booked the room after seeing the positive reviews but it was a wrong decision. I booked their room through their website for 1 day, which costed me Rs.1050. The room was very small and the bedsheets were not clean. It was all covered with dust and hair particles. No remote for controlling ac, you have to do it with bare hands. No ammenties were provided, not even water. During checkout, I was charged for water as well as extra room charge just for handling the water bottle, which is a basic ammenties for a room. Overall not a very good experience.

text.text:
The hotel is conveniently located very close to Lucknow Station, making it a good choice for travelers. The rooms are decent and comfortable overall. However, they do charge extra for early check-in and late check-out, which could be a downside for some.

The main drawback is the lack of proper maintenance—towels were not fully clean, the geyser and toilet flush weren’t functioning properly, and one room had no TV service due to an expired Tata Sky subscription. Even a single bottle of water is chargeable. With improved upkeep and attention to guest comfort, this hotel could offer a much better experience.

man, this place was such a surprise. I didn’t stay there, but I went to eat and trust me, the vibes were too good. The place looks classy from the outside and even better once you enter. I tried their bada pav and samosa, and honestly, I didn’t expect them to be that good – full desi taste with a proper clean and comfy setup.

The seating was nice, the staff was friendly, and the rooftop vibe hit different. It’s got this chilled-out yet premium feel to it. Perfect spot to hang out with friends or even for a peaceful solo meal. I’m definitely going back again to try more stuff from their menu.

I wish I could give this place zero stars. This was by far the worst hotel experience I’ve ever had. The room I was given was infested with bedbugs, and I woke up covered in bites. It was absolutely disgusting and unacceptable.

When I informed the front desk, they showed no urgency or concern. There was no apology, no offer to change the room, and certainly no compensation. Hygiene and cleanliness are the bare minimum any hotel should maintain — this hotel clearly doesn’t care about either.

Avoid this place at all costs. It’s not just uncomfortable — it’s unsafe and unsanitary. I strongly advise anyone reading this to stay elsewhere.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this incredible hotel, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way! The property is beautifully maintained, with a serene ambiance that sets the tone for a relaxing stay. The rooms are spotless and impeccably clean, making it a haven for guests.

What truly stood out, however, was the wonderful staff. Their helpfulness, courtesy, and willingness to go above and beyond made my stay truly unforgettable. From check-in to check-out, every interaction was warm and welcoming.

But what I think truly sets this hotel apart is the humble owner, who clearly has a passion for hospitality that's infectious. Their commitment to providing exceptional service and ensuring every guest feels at home is remarkable. You can tell that the owner's love for hospitality shines through in every aspect of the hotel, from the warm decor to the attentive staff.

I would wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and hassle-free stay. The combination of lovely property, clean rooms, exceptional staff, and the owner's remarkable approach to hospitality makes it a top-notch choice. Can't wait to come back!

text.text:
A Perfect Home Away From Home – A Hidden Gem of Comfort and Hospitality.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Airport Suites Rudraksham, and I must say, it was one of the most heartwarming and satisfying hotel experiences I’ve had in a long time. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with genuine warmth and hospitality that instantly made me feel at home.
The rooms are immaculately clean, tastefully decorated, and thoughtfully arranged to ensure comfort and functionality. The bed was cozy with fresh linens, and the attached bathroom was spotless with a continuous supply of water.
What truly stood out was the peaceful atmosphere – no unnecessary noise, no hotel rush – just calm, like a well-kept home.
The owner deserves a special mention, he was genuinely concerned about guest comfort. They weren’t just doing a job – they truly cared. Whether it was arranging breakfast, helping with local tips, or simply asking if I had eaten well – they were always there, with a smile.

If you’re someone who misses home-cooked meals while traveling, this place is your answer. The food here is not oily or overly spicy, but cooked with the kind of simplicity and care that reminds you of your own kitchen.
Rudraksham is more than just a place to stay – it’s a comforting experience, especially for those who miss the familiarity of home during their travels. The combination of warm hospitality, clean and quiet rooms, and soul-satisfying food makes this hotel a rare find.
Whether you're a solo traveler, a working professional on a long stay, or someone simply looking for a peaceful break – I highly recommend this hotel. It’s not flashy, not extravagant – but it’s honest, homely, and deeply comforting. And sometimes, that’s exactly what we need.

Rating: 5/5.

text.text:
**Review for Trijal Inn hotal and Banquets**
*Rating: 5/5 Stars*

I recently stayed at Trijal Inn hotal and Banquets for a weekend getaway, and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The location is fantastic—tucked away in a quiet area but still just a short walk from the bustling downtown scene. Check-in was a breeze, with friendly staff who made me feel welcome right away.

The room itself was clean and modern, with a comfy bed that practically begged me to sleep in. The view from my window was a nice bonus—overlooking a little courtyard with twinkling lights at night. The bathroom was spotless, though the water pressure in the shower could’ve been stronger. A minor gripe, but worth mentioning.

The on-site restaurant was a highlight—breakfast was included, and the Dinner options were solid too, though the menu leaned heavily on pricey upscale dishes. If you’re on a budget, you might want to explore nearby eateries instead.

A few small hiccups kept this from being a perfect stay. Wi-Fi was consistent,

Would I stay again? Definitely. It’s not flawless, and comfort that makes it worth recommending. Ideal for a relaxing escape if you can overlook the minor quirks.

Hotel Celestial Casa is a newly built hotel that truly stands out with its modern design and spacious, well-appointed rooms and suites. Everything feels brand new and thoughtfully designed for comfort and style.

They also have two large banquet halls that can easily host 500+ guests, making it a great option for weddings, corporate events, and big gatherings. The build quality is excellent, giving a premium feel throughout the property.

The only minor downside is the location and accessibility, which might not be the most convenient for everyone. But once you're there, the overall experience is definitely worth it.

A great new addition to the city’s hotel scene – perfect for both stays and events. Definitely recommended!

text.text:
Bul se bhi book nahi karna, especially if you have guests with you.

This hotel booking seemed too good to be true in reviews and picture, and unfortunately, I fell into the trap.

•	The room lock wasn’t proper.
•	No internet connectivity in the area.
•	No restaurant.
•	The rooms were just okay.
•	Frequent power cuts.
•	The hotel is in a very odd location
(Transport Nagar, where transportation parking happens).
•	The staff was average at best.
•	The receptionist was a pure insensible. He called me 10 times within 10 minutes infront of my guest for things that could have easily been handled later. Due to internet issues, some things weren’t going through, and he wasted my entire day. I was insulted in front of my friends who visited me. They told me they’d never seen such poor service.

The basic support you expect from a hotel was missing. Look, no one books a hotel for a random walk-in. I needed support as I was new to the city, and they failed miserably.

This is the last time I’m booking with Fab Hotels. Such a cheap company with a cheap mindset, ruining their guests’ entire day.

text.text:
I booked Airport Inn Lucknow thinking it would be a decent stay near the airport. Instead, I found myself in a filthy shack on the second floor of a crumbling old building in a dirty street . The staircase is broken, unsafe, and smells awful. No lift / elevators to the property in the 2nd floor .

The room was a disaster—dark, infested with cockroaches, and stained bedsheets and dirty, torn pillows. The bathroom was clogged and unclean It was extremely unhygienic.

To make matters worse, the receptionist was rude, loud, and completely unprofessional.

I had to leave early to avoid getting sick. This is not a hotel, and I strongly advise MakeMyTrip to review its listing. Ther photos posted on the site does not belong to this hotel . Most reviews are fake . Dont take my word check out the property before you pay or else you will end up loosing your money . Do not book this place—even your enemies deserve better.

text.text:
Exceptional Experience at Ramada Lucknow!

I recently stayed at Ramada by Wyndham Lucknow, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience from start to finish.

The hospitality here is truly top-notch — every staff member we interacted with went out of their way to ensure we felt welcome and well cared for. Whether it was the front desk, housekeeping, or restaurant staff, everyone maintained a perfect balance of professionalism and warmth. Their attentiveness and polite behaviour really stood out.

The folding and room arrangements were impeccable. The bed was perfectly made, towels and linens fresh and crisp, and the overall room setup reflected genuine attention to detail. It’s clear that the housekeeping team takes pride in their work.

The ambience of the hotel is just as impressive — elegant, peaceful, and thoughtfully designed, right from the grand lobby to the relaxing poolside and beautifully maintained lawns. It truly gives a resort-like vibe while still catering to business travelers.

Highly recommend this property to anyone visiting Lucknow — whether for business, events, or a leisure stay. Ramada has certainly set a high bar for hospitality in the city!
😍

text.text:
A Perfect Home Away From Home – A Hidden Gem of Comfort and Hospitality.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Airport Suites Rudraksham, and I must say, it was one of the most heartwarming and satisfying hotel experiences I’ve had in a long time. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with genuine warmth and hospitality that instantly made me feel at home.
The rooms are immaculately clean, tastefully decorated, and thoughtfully arranged to ensure comfort and functionality. The bed was cozy with fresh linens, and the attached bathroom was spotless with a continuous supply of water.
What truly stood out was the peaceful atmosphere – no unnecessary noise, no hotel rush – just calm, like a well-kept home.
The owner deserves a special mention, he was genuinely concerned about guest comfort. They weren’t just doing a job – they truly cared. Whether it was arranging breakfast, helping with local tips, or simply asking if I had eaten well – they were always there, with a smile.

If you’re someone who misses home-cooked meals while traveling, this place is your answer. The food here is not oily or overly spicy, but cooked with the kind of simplicity and care that reminds you of your own kitchen.
Rudraksham is more than just a place to stay – it’s a comforting experience, especially for those who miss the familiarity of home during their travels. The combination of warm hospitality, clean and quiet rooms, and soul-satisfying food makes this hotel a rare find.
Whether you're a solo traveler, a working professional on a long stay, or someone simply looking for a peaceful break – I highly recommend this hotel. It’s not flashy, not extravagant – but it’s honest, homely, and deeply comforting. And sometimes, that’s exactly what we need.

Rating: 5/5.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this incredible hotel, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way! The property is beautifully maintained, with a serene ambiance that sets the tone for a relaxing stay. The rooms are spotless and impeccably clean, making it a haven for guests.

What truly stood out, however, was the wonderful staff. Their helpfulness, courtesy, and willingness to go above and beyond made my stay truly unforgettable. From check-in to check-out, every interaction was warm and welcoming.

But what I think truly sets this hotel apart is the humble owner, who clearly has a passion for hospitality that's infectious. Their commitment to providing exceptional service and ensuring every guest feels at home is remarkable. You can tell that the owner's love for hospitality shines through in every aspect of the hotel, from the warm decor to the attentive staff.

I would wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and hassle-free stay. The combination of lovely property, clean rooms, exceptional staff, and the owner's remarkable approach to hospitality makes it a top-notch choice. Can't wait to come back!

text.text:
**Review for Trijal Inn hotal and Banquets**
*Rating: 5/5 Stars*

I recently stayed at Trijal Inn hotal and Banquets for a weekend getaway, and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The location is fantastic—tucked away in a quiet area but still just a short walk from the bustling downtown scene. Check-in was a breeze, with friendly staff who made me feel welcome right away.

The room itself was clean and modern, with a comfy bed that practically begged me to sleep in. The view from my window was a nice bonus—overlooking a little courtyard with twinkling lights at night. The bathroom was spotless, though the water pressure in the shower could’ve been stronger. A minor gripe, but worth mentioning.

The on-site restaurant was a highlight—breakfast was included, and the Dinner options were solid too, though the menu leaned heavily on pricey upscale dishes. If you’re on a budget, you might want to explore nearby eateries instead.

A few small hiccups kept this from being a perfect stay. Wi-Fi was consistent,

Would I stay again? Definitely. It’s not flawless, and comfort that makes it worth recommending. Ideal for a relaxing escape if you can overlook the minor quirks.
